meanings.definition: To make a mess or to be messy.
meanings.sent1: She blauded the room by spilling paint everywhere.
meanings.sent2: Please don't blaud your toys all over the floor.
meanings.sent3: The puppy blauded his food all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork blauded colors in a chaotic dance.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter blauded through the house as they played.

meanings.definition: A mess or a state of disorder.
meanings.sent1: The blaud in the living room was a result of the party.
meanings.sent2: I can't find my keys in this blaud on the table.
meanings.sent3: The blaud of papers on his desk made him feel overwhelmed.
meanings.sent4: The blaud of traffic during rush hour was unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The blaud of fallen leaves covered the sidewalk after the storm.
